attributes.action: call for the immediate reinstatement of Jonathan Ross, Russel Brand and Leslie Douglas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For god sakes!!!! Personally, the whole Andrew Sachs prank call wasn't really my cup of tea. But the whole affair has gone out of control!! Do we really want to be part of a society where we live in constant fear of offending someone? Do we really want to be part of a society of censorships? Every piece of comedy, every piece of news, documentary and just about everythingelse that has a hint of profound value can be offensive to somebody somewhere. Let's be mature about reality and quit complaining.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
